thread.title: Huntingdon turns attention to road trip to Ferrum
thread.title_full: Huntingdon turns attention to road trip to Ferrum

author: Stephen Gunter
title: Huntingdon turns attention to road trip to Ferrum
text:
Huntingdon turns attention to road trip to Ferrum Posted: MONTGOMERY, AL (WSFA) - 
The Huntingdon Hawks beat North Carolina Wesleyan 45-40 on Saturday to improve to 3-1 on the season. 
Luke Bailey accounted for four total touchdowns in the Homecoming win. 
Bailey passed for 296 yards and three touchdowns and added and another rushing score. 
He and the Hawks hit the road to Ferrum on Saturday. 
They will be looking for a 2-0 start to conference play. 
"Getting ready to go to Virginia to play next week. I'm sure that will be a tough test. It's a long road trip. We have a lot of healing to do. A lot of getting better to do between now and then. A lot of coaching to do, but I'm confident that our guys will be ready," said Huntingdon coach Mike Turk 
Hawks return home Saturday, Oct. 24.
